body.p: Starting with version 23, includes support for some DITA 2.0 features. In the Options Preferences DITA page, you can select the Enable DITA 2.0 Editing Support (Experimental) checkbox to enable them.

The following table is a list of DITA 2.0 features and their implementation status in . The list of proposed DITA 2.0 changes is published here: . DITA 2.0 Features Implementation Status
Feature Editing Publishing [DITA Open Toolkit is used]
DITA 2.0 DTD, and Relax NG-based maps/topics/tasks/references, etc.
New DITA 2.0 document templates.
Also supported by the publishing engine.
Other new DITA 2.0 elements (include, etc.)
Validation and Content Completion.
Special rendering in PDF and XHTML-based outputs: .
Profiling attributes defined using the new specializations attribute. Profiling attributes defined using the new specializations attribute are recognized by the application. Also supported by the publishing engine.
